description: Be prepared to stay in touch when your original battery loses its charge. Motorola replacement batteries provide a backup power source and also give you the opportunity to increase talk time. 910 mAh Lithium-Ion Battery
title: OEM Motorola P323 Battery Charger for BC50, BC60, BC70, BK60, BK70, BK61, BK71, BK90, BK91, BP6X, BS6X, BQ50, BT50, BT51, BT60, BT61, BT70, BT71, BT90, BT91, SNN5765, SNN5783, SNN5762, BN60, BN61, BN70, BN10, and BN11 Batteries
